_source.text: 8. Christopher Corey Smith - Just the sort of performance you'd expect from Joker. 9. Allen Enlow - Would fit "The Dark Knight Returns" Joker MUCH better than Michael Emerson, especially the way he says "darling!" 10.

text: 8. Christopher **Corey** **Smith** - Just the sort of performance you'd expect from Joker. 9. Allen Enlow
- Would fit "The Dark Knight Returns" Joker MUCH **better** **than** Michael Emerson, especially the way he says "darling!" 10.
